languages.text: "Меня отдали на потеху Тервантьясу. На аренах Комморры Астартес — редкость, и он выпускал меня убивать гладиаторов". {n}С каждым словом голос Ульфара тяжелеет от горечи и злобы.{/n} "Я ненавидел. Постоянно ненавидел, каждое мгновение!" {n}Взревев и выругавшись на фенрисийском, воин переводит дух.{/n} "Приходилось заботиться о своем разуме, пока он не сгинул в Семи Преисподних".

"I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."
languages.original_text: "Меня отдали на потеху Тервантьясу. На аренах Комморры Астартес — редкость, и он выпускал меня убивать гладиаторов". {n}С каждым словом голос Ульфара тяжелеет от горечи и злобы.{/n} "Я ненавидел. Постоянно ненавидел, каждое мгновение!" {n}Взревев и выругавшись на фенрисийском, воин переводит дух.{/n} "Приходилось заботиться о своем разуме, пока он не сгинул в Семи Преисподних".

Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

"I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

languages.text: “我被带到了特万提亚斯那里，供他取乐。科摩罗的竞技场上很少会出现阿斯塔特修士，他命令我杀掉那些角斗士。”{n}乌尔法每说一个字，语气中的痛苦与敌意就多一分。{/n}“我沦为了那个异形的傀儡，变成了毫无荣耀的杀戮机器……我痛恨这样的人生！极其痛恨！每时每刻都在痛恨！”{n}乌尔法用芬里斯语咆哮、咒骂了一阵子之后，喘了口气。{/n}“我不得不保护好我的心智，否则它就会被扭曲到七重地狱之中。”
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: “我被带到了特万提亚斯那里，供他取乐。科摩罗的竞技场上很少会出现阿斯塔特修士，他命令我杀掉那些角斗士。”{n}乌尔法每说一个字，语气中的痛苦与敌意就多一分。{/n}“我痛恨这种事情！非常痛恨！无时无刻不痛恨！”{n}乌尔法用芬里斯语咆哮、咒骂了一阵子之后，喘了口气。{/n}“我不得不保护好我的心智，否则它就会被扭曲到七重地狱之中。”

languages.text: «Fui regalado a Tervantias para su diversión. En las arenas de Commorragh escasean los Astartes, así que me envió a matar gladiadores». {n}Cada palabra intensifica la amargura y la hostilidad de la voz de Ulfar.{/n} «Vivir como el carnicero amaestrado de ese xenos... Lo odiaba. Constantemente. ¡A cada momento!». {n}Tras un rugido y una sarta de improperios fenrisianos, Ulfar recupera el aliento.{/n} «Tuve que cuidar de mi mente antes de que fuera retorcida por los Siete Infiernos».
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: «Fui regalado a Tervantias para su diversión. En las arenas de Commorragh escasean los Astartes, así que me envió a matar gladiadores». {n}Cada palabra intensifica la amargura y la hostilidad de la voz de Ulfar.{/n} «Lo odiaba. Constantemente. ¡A cada momento!». {n}Tras un rugido y una sarta de improperios fenrisianos, Ulfar recupera el aliento.{/n} «Tuve que cuidar de mi mente antes de que fuera retorcida por los Siete Infiernos».

languages.text: 「俺はテルヴァンティアスの娯楽のために来た。コモラフの闘技場でアスタルテスは珍しい存在で、奴はグラディエイターを殺させるために俺を送り込んだのさ」{n}話を進めるたび、ウルファーの声に辛さと敵意が滲む。{/n}「不名誉な肉裂きマシン、異種族の操り人形…そんな生き方はごめんだった。ずっと。どんな時も！」{n}しばらくフェンリスらしい激しい怒声をあげて、ウルファーは、ひと呼吸置いた。{/n}「自分の心をなんとかしなければ、心が七獄へとねじれそうだった」
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: 「ターバンティアスの娯楽に使われたコモラフの闘技場では、アスタルテスは珍しい存在だった。そこで彼は、剣闘士を殺すために俺を送り出した」{n}言葉を重ねるごとに、ウルファーの声には苦みと敵意が増していく。{/n}「嫌だった。常に。一瞬一瞬が！」{n}しばらくの間、フェンリスの言葉で咆哮し荒れ狂った後、ウルファーは息を整えた。{/n}「七獄にねじ込まれる前に、己の心を守らねばならなかった」

languages.text: "Ich wurde Tervantias überlassen, um ihn zu unterhalten. In den Arenen von Commorragh sind Astartes eine Seltenheit, und er hat mich hinausgeschickt, um Gladiatoren zu töten." {n}Mit jeden Wort wachsen die Verbitterung und Feindseligkeit in Ulfars Stimme.{/n} "Als ehrloser Schlächter und Xenos-Marionette zu leben ... Ich habe es gehasst. Ununterbrochen. Jeden Augenblick!" {n}Nachdem er eine Weile auf Fenrisisch getobt und gewütet hat, atmet Ulfar tief durch.{/n} "Ich musste auf meinen Verstand achten, ehe er in den Sieben Höllen versank."
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde Tervantias überlassen, um ihn zu unterhalten. In den Arenen von Commorragh sind Astartes eine Seltenheit, und er mich hinausgeschickt, um Gladiatoren zu töten." {n}Mit jeden Wort wachsen die Verbitterung und Feindseligkeit in Ulfars Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe es gehasst. Ununterbrochen. Jeden Augenblick!" {n}Nachdem er eine Weile auf Fenrisisch getobt und gewütet hat, atmet Ulfar tief durch.{/n} "Ich musste auf meinen Verstand achten, ehe er in die Sieben Höllen versank."

languages.text: « On m'a livré à Tervantias pour son amusement. Dans les arènes de Commorragh, les Astartes sont rares, et il m'y a envoyé tuer des gladiateurs. » {n}Avec chaque mot, l'amertume et l'hostilité percent un peu plus dans la voix d'Ulfar.{/n} « Être réduit à l'état de vulgaire boucher à la solde d'un xénos... C'était un calvaire interminable. J'en ai haï chaque instant ! » {n}Ulfar rugit et jure en fenrissien pendant un moment, avant de reprendre son souffle.{/n} « J'ai dû ménager mon esprit pour le préserver de la corruption des sept enfers. »
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été donné à Tervantias pour son amusement. Dans les arènes de Commorragh, les Astartes sont rares, et il m'a envoyé y tuer des gladiateurs. » {n}Avec chaque mot, l'amertume et l'hostilité percent un peu plus dans la voix d'Ulfar.{/n} « J'ai détesté ça. Sans trêve ni répit. J'ai haï chaque instant ! » {n}Ulfar rugit et jure en fenrissien pendant un moment, avant de reprendre son souffle.{/n} « J'ai dû veiller sur mon esprit pour éviter qu'il bascule dans les Sept Enfers. »

languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

languages.text: "Eğlence için Tervantias'a verildim. Commorragh arenalarında pek Astartes bulunmaz. Ondan beni gladyatörleri öldürmem için arenaya yolladı." {n}Ağzından dökülen her bir kelimeyle Ulfar'ın sesindeki öfke ve acı artıyor.{/n} "Alçak bir kasap ve zeno kuklası olarak yaşadım. Nefret ettim! Her anından! Sürekli!" {n}Bir süre Fenrisçe kükreyip sinirini attıktan sonra Ulfar, derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Yerin Yedi Kat Altı kadar çarpıklaşmadan zihnimi toparlamalıydım."
languages.original_text: "I was given to Tervantias for his amusement. In the arenas of Commorragh, Astartes are a rarity, and he sent me out there to kill gladiators." {n}With every word, the bitterness and hostility in Ulfar's voice grow.{/n} "Living as an inglorious butcher and a xenos's puppet... I hated it. Constantly. Every moment!" {n}After roaring and raging in Fenrisian for a time, Ulfar catches his breath.{/n} "I had to take care of my mind, before it was twisted to the Seven Hells."

traits.locale_text: "Eğlence için Tervantias'a verildim. Commorragh arenalarında pek Astartes bulunmazdı. O yüzden beni gladyatörleri öldürmem için oraya yolladı." {n}Ağzından dökülen her bir kelimeyle Ulfar'ın sesindeki öfke ve acı artıyor.{/n} "Alçak bir kasap ve zeno kuklası olarak yaşadım. Nefret ettim! Her anından! Sürekli!" {n}Bir süre Fenrisçe kükreyip sinirini attıktan sonra Ulfar, derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Yerin Yedi Kat Altı kadar çarpık bir hâle gelmeden zihnimi toparlamalıydım."
